#
# Name: BaDomain IP
# Desc: An "addon" to block even more bad IPs Addreses
#       Will block malware domains, tracking domains, anything bad that can't be
#       blocked from dns request by hosts file (includes MLBB, FF, TikTok, Facebook products..., *indonesian* Gambling sites, which is notorious for using ip to evade Kominfo ban)
#       i put it here just to simplify my workflow (especially in hosts conversion).
# Version: 07.12.21
# Update: 1 days
#
